A Team of Drone Pilots Wherever You Are

Our team of drone pilots is decentralized.

We are based in Europe (France and Sweden) and in Northern America. We often move abroad throughout Europe and beyond.
These passionated drone pilots in charge of your captions come from various expertises such as journalism, science research, tourism and new technologies.

We take care of drone photos and videos sky views

and video editing. High quality formats are also provided to you. </p>
Next

Various Professional Specialties

The main fields in which we operate drone capture are

  • journalism ;
  • touristism and documentaries ;
  • architectural heritage ;
  • accompanying for technical studies in unreachable spots.

The most appropriate dronists will be in charge of your mission

Professional systems

Our drones are equiped with high fidelity hardware

Our drones are selected to be light and reliable, GPS stabilized, 4K high resolution cameras, sport video with 100i/s and slow-motion able.
